skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: social media facts
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Social Media Facts gives you a look into what social media is really doing.

Make sure you come back to learn new facts that occur daily.

You can say:

"Alexa, open Social Media Facts"
"Alexa, start Social Media Facts"
"Alexa, launch Social Media Facts"

Please leave a review of the skill after you have learned something new. You can also send me a email if you have any suggestions for the skill at Taylor@proeliomedia.com so we can make sure that this skill is doing the best it can. Your review encourages us to create more content for you in the future!

Thanks!

Taylor
priv:
